item.title: Character encodings: ASCII, UTF-8, Unicode and what is Latin-1?
item.description: What is Unicode, why is it used everywhere, and what are the options? We, software developers need to use string data types pretty much daily and yet, there is a lot under the surface that nowadays we don’t even think about anymore. This makes character encodings a basic thing, but is it simple? Encoding, you say? So let’s start from the beginning, what is “enconding”, really? To encode is to convert one type of data into another type.
